timeline.message: Minor cleanup: replace Booleans with primitives, remove local variables

timeline.bodyText: baseUrl is final and we are assigning null here in constructor? When are we assigning the value to it then?
timeline.author: Ayyanchira

replies.bodyText: oh ok... there is another constructor for that.... Got it...
replies.author: Ayyanchira

replies.bodyText: It is only ever set in one of the constructors (the one above this one), and never  changed, so it is safe to make it final and assign to null in all other constructors.
replies.author: vbabenkoru
